decision.reason: Market is in a weak downtrend with price significantly below the EMA1000. ADX indicates no trend strength, and news sentiment is mixed with warnings of a potential further bottom.
decision.risk_note: High uncertainty due to negative EMA slope and low trend strength; entering now risks catching a falling knife.

decision.reason: Price is significantly below EMA1000 with a negative slope, indicating a strong long-term downtrend despite neutral short-term sentiment.
decision.risk_note: ADX shows very weak trend strength and analysts suggest the ultimate bear market bottom may not be in yet.

decision.reason: Tendance baissière confirmée par l'EMA1000 et un ADX très faible indiquant une absence de momentum clair malgré un sentiment neutre.
decision.risk_note: Risque de poursuite de la baisse vers le bas du marché (bear market bottom) selon les analystes ; volatilité faible mais incertitude élevée.

most_impactful_headline.title: ARK turns bullish on Coinbase again with $15M purchase after selling spree
most_impactful_headline.excerpt: Cathie Wood’s ARK Invest added nearly $15.2 million in Coinbase stock across three ETFs, reversing course days after offloading more than $39 million in shares.

top_headlines_used.title: All social program benefits can be distributed onchain: Compliance exec
top_headlines_used.excerpt: Hong Kong, Thailand, and the Marshall Islands are exploring tokenized debt instruments and administering social benefit programs onchain.

top_headlines_used.excerpt: Mark Moran is using a meme coin on Solana to elevate his U.S. Senate bid, rallying degens against a pro-crypto Democrat in Virginia.

decision.reason: Tendance baissière forte confirmée par l'ADX (42) et prix sous l'EMA1000. Malgré un sentiment neutre, le marché n'a pas encore trouvé son plancher.
decision.risk_note: Risque de poursuite de la chute vers le bas du canal. L'incertitude sur le fond du marché Bitcoin pèse sur SOL.
